constituent: adore, mountain, religion, house, altar, show, two, small
koohiiStory1: In ancient Greece, it was the religion of the time to adore the gods who live on Mount Olympus.
koohiiStory2: I would adore the religious people if they just went and threw themselves off a mountain top.
words: 崇拝(すうはい): worship, adoration, admiration, cult
